ProductInfo.Features:
Processor	Dual-core Apple A6X custom-designed, high-performance, low-power system-on-a-chip with quad-core graphics Operating system	Apple iOS 6 Screen type	Retina Screen resolution	2048-by-1536-pixel resolution at 264 pixels per inch (ppi) Screen size	9.7 inches Touchscreen	LED-backlit glossy wide-screen Multi-Touch display with IPS technology Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating Screen features	Support for display of multiple languages and characters simultaneously VoiceOver screen reader Support for playback of closed-captioned content AssistiveTouch interface for adaptive accessories Full-screen zoom magnification Large fonts White on black display Left/right volume adjustment
Device interface	Lightning connector 3.5-mm stereo headphone minijack Wireless	Bluetooth 4.0 Internet connection	802.11a/b/g/n WiFi (802.11n 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz) + cellular  Model A1459* GSM/EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz) UMTS/HSPA+/DC-HSDPA (850, 900, 1900, 2100 MHz) LTE (Bands 4 and 17)**  Model A1460* CDMA EV-DO Rev. A and Rev. B (800, 1900, 2100 MHz) GSM/EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz) UMTS/HSPA+/DC-HSDPA (850, 900, 1900, 2100 MHz)  LTE (Bands 1, 3, 5, 13, 25)**  Data only3  Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology Audio interface	Built-in speaker Microphone
Sound	 Frequency response: 20Hz to 20,000Hz  Audio formats supported: AAC (8 to 320 Kbps), Protected AAC (from iTunes Store), HE-AAC, MP3 (8 to 320 Kbps), MP3 VBR, Audible (formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX and AAX+), Apple Lossless, AIFF and WAV Camera	FaceTime HD Camera: 1.2 Megapixel photos; HD 720 p videos iSight 5 megapixels camera HD 1080 p video recording Additional features	Video formats supported: H.264 video up to 1080p, 30 frames per second, High Profile level 4.1 with AAC-LC audio up to 160 Kbps, 48kHz, stereo audio in .m4v, .mp4 and .mov file formats; MPEG-4 video up to 2.5 Mbps, 640x480 pixels, 30 frames per second, Simple Profile with AAC-LC audio up to 160 Kbps per channel, 48kHz, stereo audio in .m4v, .mp4 and .mov file formats; Motion JPEG (M-JPEG) up to 35 Mbps, 1280x720 pixels, 30 frames per second, audio in ulaw, PCM stereo audio in .avi file format
Menu languages	Language support for English (U.S.), English (UK), Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Arabic, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Malay, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese Accessories included	Lightning Connector to USB Cable USB Power Adapter Battery type	Built-in 42.5-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery Battery life	Up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi-Fi, watching video, or listening to music Dimensions	Height: 241.2 mm Width: 185.7 mm Depth: 9.4 mm Weight	652 g
ProductInfo.Name: Apple Ipad 4 Retina Wi-fi + 4g Cellular 128gb Black Me406
